videos.headline: Purdue's defense forces early turnover
videos.description: Garrett Hudson intercepts a Richard Lagow pass and returns it 21 yards to the Indiana 5-yard line.

videos.headline: Boilermakers strike first
videos.description: Jackson Anthrop takes the end-around into the end zone for the 5-yard TD run in the first quarter.

videos.headline: Hoosiers defense picks up fumble
videos.description: Purdue's Jarrett Burgess simply loses the football and it's picked up by Tegray Scales for Indiana.

videos.headline: Cobbs toe taps for TD
videos.description: Indiana WR Simmie Cobbs gets two feet down in the corner of the end zone for the Hoosiers touchdown.

videos.headline: Boilermakers pull off fake punt
videos.description: Punter Joe Schopper tricks the Hoosier punt return team by connecting with Mike Little for a 1st down .

videos.headline: Purdue's Anthrop scores second TD
videos.description: The Boilermakers score their second touchdown with the same exact play as the first with Jackson Anthrop scoring on a 4-yard touchdown, putting them up seven in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Purdue's Mahoungou 'Mosses' defender for TD
videos.description: Anthony Mahhoungou plays the role of Randy Moss by snagging the ball away from Indiana's Rashard Fant and taking it 49 yards for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Indiana's Brookins scampers for 64 yards
videos.description: The fleet footed Ricky Brookins bounces off defenders on his way to a 64-yard run for the Hoosiers.

videos.headline: Purdue's Knox hurdles over defender
videos.description: D.J. Knox sprints through the Hoosier defense for 39 yards and capping off the run by getting big air over a defender before being slammed down to the ground.

videos.headline: Bromh happy with defensive performance
videos.description: Purdue head coach Jeff Brohm breaks down how his defense shut down Indiana in the first half.

videos.headline: Purdue's Sindelar buys time, hits Zico for TD
videos.description: QB Elijah Sindelar finds his wide receiver Isaac Zico in the end zone for the touchdown in the fourth quarter.

videos.headline: Indiana's Mack escapes the defense for 52-yard gain
videos.description: QB Richard Lagow finds a wide open Taysir Mack for a huge 52-yard gain in the fourth quarter.

videos.headline: Indiana's Lagow connects with Mack for TD
videos.description: Hoosiers QB Richard Lagow hits Taysir Mack for the 4-yard touchdown in the fourth quarter.

videos.headline: Indiana recovers onside kick
videos.description: The comeback is on, as the Hoosiers recover an onside kick late in the fourth quarter.

videos.headline: Indiana's Philyor dives in for late TD
videos.description: QB Richard Lagow connects with Whop Philyor who takes it in from 9 yards out for the  touchdown.

videos.headline: Purdue's rushing attack too much for the Hoosiers
videos.description: Markell Jones' 217 rushing yards pave the way for Purdue's 31-24 win over Indiana, making the Boilermakers bowl eligible.
